div.h1: À voir et à faire à Victoria

section.p: Le site de Tourism Victoria propose une vaste sélection d’activités, de restaurants et de suggestions pour planifier votre séjour.

ul.li: Choose smaller donuts or share with a friend
Opt for low-calorie toppings like sprinkles or chocolate chips
Consider having a donut-free day once a week

section.p: Coffee is a popular beverage enjoyed by many people around the world. It's a great way to start your day or give yourself a boost of energy throughout the day.

ul.li: Choose decaf coffee if you're sensitive to caffeine
Try different types of coffee like espresso, latte, or cappuccino
Experiment with different flavors like vanilla or hazelnut
